summary: A two‑stage neural pipeline that first transforms mel‑frequency spectrograms into linear‑frequency spectrograms and then synthesises waveform audio, handling data preparation, training, validation and device placement.
business_intent: Enable end‑to‑end speech or audio generation systems, such as text‑to‑speech or voice conversion services, by providing a ready‑to‑train model that converts mel representations into high‑quality audio.
